report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-26726 Apple watchOS Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-26726 Apple watchOS Vulnerability
text: Apple watchOS could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a flaw in the TCC component. By executing a specially-crafted application, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to capture a users screen, and use this information to launch further attacks against the affected system.
